Alicia Pearse Web Developer

About Me Projects Blog

My Expertise

After graduating with a B.A. in Political Economy from the U.C. Berkeley and working in financial services in London, Alicia began coding for fun and to learn the practical skill of making web applications. Having her roots in Costa Rica and recently working in England, Alicia offers diversity, brings lots of energy and has a true global perspective useful in problem solving beyond the IDE. Alicia is professional, goes above and beyond to meet her deliverables and enjoys being social. In her spare time Alicia likes to read tech blogs, learn new technologies and play the flute. One of Alicia's favorites quotes is, 'If you are the smartest person in the room, then you are in the wrong room.'
